dublin_core.dcvalue: In this study we proposed new self assessment of hearing loss in mobile phones and realized a function of compensation for hearing impaired person The results of experiments on mobile phone showed that the proposed hearing test is sufficient to check hearing loss and the compensation based on the result of the proposed hearing test can improve speech intelligibility of hearing impaired persons
Conference proceedings : ... Annual International Conference of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. Annual Conference
Study on self hearing assessment using speech sounds.
